group_1.textLeft: There we go…
I'm back!

group_1.textRight: Thank you, Toyo! You saved us!

group_1.textLeft: It was nothing.

group_1.textRight: …Actually, Toyo, there's something I need@to tell you…
When you become a Magical Girl, you…

group_1.textLeft: …I have to pay the price, right?@Well, it makes sense.
My body suddenly became free out of nowhere,@so things have gotta balance out.

group_1.textRight: You're strong, Toyo.

group_1.textLeft: I just don't want to lose to despair.

group_1.textRight: Is that Lady Toyo?@What is she wearing…?

group_1.textLeft: This? Heh…this is…
It's a robe given to me from the heavens!
With its power, I was able to defeat@the Cursed God!

group_1.textRight: Th-the heavens…
So does that end our troubles…?

group_1.textLeft: No. I've heard there are more people possessed@by Cursed Gods.
I'll keep on fighting against the Cursed Gods@so I can protect all of our lives…
But of course, I can't run the country@all by myself.
I'm still so new to all this…@So I need everyone's support.
So please, everyone, help me build our country@together!

group_1.textRight: Of course, Lady Toyo!
Let's build our country together!

group_1.textCenter: Leading the masses, but being supported@by them all the same…
That's where it all started for me…
…To think Toyo's appearance would return me@to those days…

group_1.textRight: Toyo was always chasing you…@At least, that's how it seems to me.
How does that saying go? "Children grow up@looking at their parents' backs…?"

group_1.textLeft: …But what did she see in me?@Why…?

group_1.textRight: Lady Himiko…

group_1.textLeft: I didn't want her to become like me…
I wanted her to be an ordinary girl… In a place@without politics or war. Just…a normal girl.

group_1.textCenter: We gotta work to help restore this village@as soon as we can…
But we need more people to do it.

group_1.textRight: This way! Hurry!
Oh, it's Lady Toyo…@What are you doing here?

group_1.textLeft: I was exterminating a Cursed God.@And you?

group_1.textRight: Exterminating a Cursed God…@That's excellent to hear.
We learned that Kuna has invaded this area.
We rallied our troops and rushed over here@as fast as we could.

group_1.textLeft: That battle's been over for a while now.

group_1.textRight: I-is that so…?@You have my deepest apologies…

group_1.textLeft: No, don't worry…since you're here,@you can help us with rebuilding the village!
We were just short of the people we needed!

group_1.textRight: In that case, we'll gladly help.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm… It'd be great if we somehow had@a woodcutter too…

group_1.textCenter: Excuse me, where is your leader?

group_1.textLeft: Who are you…?

group_1.textRight: I'm a woodcutter.
I'm from the next village over, and I thought@you guys might need some help around here.
I wanted to get permission from your leader…

group_1.textLeft: Hey, you're just the kind of person we were@looking for…!
N-no way… Isn't it a bit TOO convenient that the@people she needs just happen to end up here?

group_1.textRight: …Maybe that's Toyo's magic…?

group_1.textLeft: It's glowing…!

group_1.textRight: The concept was retrieved…@We just need a little more.

group_1.textLeft: …This long summer is almost over.
